fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.kernel.adaptative

Class WeightedProductKernel<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.kernel.Kernel<T>
      • fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.kernel.adaptative.WeightedProductKernel<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - data type of input space.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class WeightedProductKernel<T>
extends Kernel<T>
    performs a weighted product of several minor kernels, non threaded version.
    Author:
    dpicard
    See Also:
    ThreadedProductKernel, Serialized Form
